input_text:
Job Title: Medical Sales Executive

Location: Seattle, WA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
About UsPerformance Home Medical has been a leader in providing quality products and services since 1995.At Performance Home Medical, our patients come first. Using the latest technology and best clinical support, we help our patients take control of their conditions and live longer and healthier.We are seeking a motivated, high energy, individual to be an Account Executive for our new Diabetes Division.This is a field-based sales position, calling on physician offices and other medical facilities. The territories we are hiring for are Dallas/Fort Worth, Houston, and Austin/San Antonio.We’ve got a fun, positive, performance-oriented team. We offer a competitive salary with uncapped commissions and a great career path. To help ensure your success, we have a comprehensive onboarding and training program that includes field based-ride alongs with reps and managers, distance learning, classroom training, as well as ongoing support and training.
Account ExecutiveThe Account Executive is responsible for: building relationships with physicians and other health care professionals within their assigned territory to generate referrals in line with sales quotas.
· Promotes diabetes products and services to target referral sources through in-office sales calls and in-services.
· Develops relationships with prescribing providers including endocrinologists, PCP's, and Internal Medicine to develop & enhance relationships.
· Establishes new and maintains ongoing business with referral sources.
· Works with Sales Leadership to develop territory call plans that accelerate business growth.
· Works cross-functionally with internal stakeholders to help ensure timely processing of orders.
· Communicates Performance Home Medical value proposition to effectively differentiate Performance Home Medical from competitors.
· Learns and communicates reimbursement guidelines for all relevant payors to referral sources.
· Creates, executes, and manages territory call plan.
· Documents call plan and call activity in CRM.
· Other duties as assigned.
· Business ethics and integrity.
· 3 plus years’ documented success achieving sales goals in a relationship selling based field, in healthcare industry a plus.
· 3 plus years’ experience utilizing consultative, and solution based selling approaches preferred.
· Experience working with endocrinology clinics is a plus.
· Demonstrated ability to work in a collaborative environment with outside medical professionals, internal customer care teams, clinical teams, operations staff, sales leaders, and other internal stakeholders.
· Understanding of insurance guidelines to qualify physician’s orders.
· Current market and industry knowledge.
· Proficiency with Microsoft Office Suite and PowerPoint as well as electronic prescribing platforms.
· Valid driver’s license and ability to travel within assigned territory.
· Candidate must reside in assigned geographical territory.
· Highly motivated
· Excellent relationship building skills and personality
· Excellent communication and presentation skills
· Service orientation and experience selling services strongly preferred
· Experience in DME or Diabetes a plus
· Occasional overnight travel
Benefits:401(k)401(k) matchingDental insuranceDisability insuranceHealth insuranceLife insurancePaid time offVision insurance
Experience level:3 yearsSchedule:8 hour shift
Work setting:ClinicIn-personMedical officeOffice
Experience:Sales: 3 years (Preferred)
Ability to relocate in one of the locations:Seattle, WAOregonTexasWork Location: In person

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Medical Sales Executive
output_json.summary: Seeking a motivated individual for a field-based sales position in the Diabetes Division.
soft_skills: Excellent relationship building skills and personality
job_responsibilities: Building relationships with physicians and health care professionals
Generating referrals in line with sales quotas
Establishing and maintaining business with referral sources
Working with Sales Leadership to develop territory call plans
Coordinating with internal stakeholders for timely order processing
Communicating Performance Home Medical's value proposition
Creating and managing territory call plan
Documenting call plan and call activity in CRM
output_json.company_information: Performance Home Medical has been a leader in providing quality products and services since 1995. Our mission is to help patients take control of their conditions and live longer, healthier lives.
